channel.title: That good old girl
channel.description: When new people log on my server there female and bald and such how do i make it so your male when u log on :D

item.title: That good old girl
item.dc:creator: @vrac_defiled vrac defiled
item.description:
@vrac_defiled wrote:

search for this in player.java

playerLook[0]

then go under it and you should find:

pHead=1; pTorso=18; pArms=26; pHands=33; pLegs=36; pFeet=42; pBeard=14; pBeard=8;
or something like that. Change the numbers at the end to customize the player when it starts.

here is the list:

[code]/*
0-9: male head
10-17: male beard
18-25: male torso
26-32: male arms
33-35: male hands
36-41: male legs
42-44: male feet

45-55: fem head
56-60: fem torso
61-66: fem arms
67-69: fem hands
70-78: fem legs
79-81: fem feet
*/[/code]

Read full topic
